item.title: About Me
item.author: v.taghiloo@gmail.com (Vahid)
item.description:
Hi, my name is Vahid. I am an electronics enthusiast from IRAN. I like making things, cooking, reading, watching movies and animes, python, GNU/Linux, FOSS and lots of bunch of stuff. My native language is not English so if you see any misspelling or grammatical errors please feel free to tell me.

Contact me

v.taghiloo@gmail.com

item.title: First post on my blog
item.author: v.taghiloo@gmail.com (Vahid)
item.description: Ok, this is my first post on my first blog. I’m using github/hugo/github_pages to create it (I will definitely write a post about hugo). In this blog I’ll write about my projects, working with electronic modules, GNU/linux and my hobbies. I’m still learning stuff but bear with me on this, eventually I will get better. My native language is not english so if you see any misspelling or grammatical errors please feel free to tell me.
